sections.name: Cloudsplitter
sections.text: This creature did not include a description.

traits.name: Unique
traits.text: A rules element with this trait is one-of-a-kind. The DC of Recall Knowledge checks related to creatures with this trait is increased by 10.

traits.name: Lawful
traits.text: Lawful effects often manipulate energy from law-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to chaotic divine servants or divine servants of chaotic deities. A creature with this trait is lawful in alignment.

traits.name: Good
traits.text: Good effects often manipulate energy from good-aligned Outer Planes and are antithetical to evil divine servants or divine servants of evil deities. A creature with this trait is good in alignment.

traits.name: Large
traits.text: *Space:* 10 feet, *Reach (Tall):* 10 feet, *Reach (Long):* 5 feet

traits.name: Air
traits.text: Effects with the air trait either manipulate or conjure air. Those that manipulate air have no effect in a vacuum or an area without air. Creatures with this trait consist primarily of air or have a magical connection to that element. Planes with this trait consist mostly of open spaces and air with various degrees of turbulence, though they also contain rare islands of floating stone and other elements and energies.

traits.name: Fire
traits.text: Effects with the fire trait deal fire damage or either conjure or manipulate fire. Those that manipulate fire have no effect in an area without fire. Creatures with this trait consist primarily of fire or have a magical connection to that element. Planes with this trait are composed of flames that continually burn with no fuel source. Fire planes are extremely hostile to non-fire creatures.

traits.name: Phantom
traits.text: A phantom is soul that has diverged from the River of Souls on the Ethereal Plane before being judged. They typically retain memories of their life before death, but are not undead.

traits.name: Spirit
traits.text: Spirits are ephemeral creatures defined by their spiritual self and often lacking a physical form.

link.name: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 19
link.alt: Pathfinder #168: King of the Mountain pg. 19

modifiers.name: –1 status penalty to all saves vs. death effects

automatic_abilities.name: Peaceful Aura

traits.name: Abjuration
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the abjuration school of magic, typically involving protection or wards.

traits.name: Aura
traits.text: An aura is an emanation that continually ebbs out from you, affecting creatures within a certain radius. Aura can also refer to the magical signature of an item or a creature with a strong alignment.

traits.name: Divine
traits.text: This magic comes from the divine tradition, drawing power from deities or similar sources. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Emotion
traits.text: This effect alters a creature's emotions. Effects with this trait always have the mental trait as well. Creatures with special training or that have mechanical or artificial intelligence are immune to emotion effects.

traits.name: Mental
traits.text: A mental effect can alter the target's mind. It has no effect on an object or a mindless creature.

automatic_abilities.text: Creatures within a kirin's peaceful aura attempting to use a hostile action must first attempt a DC 39 Will save; on a failure, the hostile action is disrupted. If a creature in the aura successfully uses a hostile action, it's temporarily immune to peaceful aura for 24 hours, and while it's temporarily immune, other creatures in the kirin's peaceful aura can perform hostile actions toward it without needing to attempt a Will save. A kirin can select creatures within their aura that can use hostile actions without needing to attempt a Will save. Cloudsplitter allows anyone involved in the player character's bout with Jin-Hae to use hostile actions without a Will save.

automatic_abilities.name: Deflecting Gale
automatic_abilities.trigger: The kirin is targeted with a ranged Strike
automatic_abilities.effect: The kirin intensifies the wind around themself, gaining a circumstance bonus to AC against the triggering attack.

automatic_abilities.name: Susceptible to Death
automatic_abilities.text: Though phantoms aren't alive, neither are they undead, and they are uniquely vulnerable to the effects of death. A phantom whose Hit Points are reduced to 0 as a result of a death effect (such as from a spell like *finger of death*) is immediately whisked away to the River of Souls, where their soul resumes the usual path to the afterlife.

traits.name: Force
traits.text: Effects with this trait deal force damage or create objects made of pure magical force.

traits.name: Magical
traits.text:
Something with the magical trait is imbued with magical energies not tied to a specific tradition of magic. A magical item radiates a magic aura infused with its dominant school of magic.  
  
 Some items or effects are closely tied to a particular tradition of magic. In these cases, the item has the arcane, divine, occult, or primal trait instead of the magical trait. Any of these traits indicate that the item is magical.

traits.name: Agile
traits.text: The multiple attack penalty you take with this weapon on the second attack on your turn is –4 instead of –5, and –8 instead of –10 on the third and subsequent attacks in the turn.

traits.name: Force
traits.text: Effects with this trait deal force damage or create objects made of pure magical force.

traits.name: Magical
traits.text:
Something with the magical trait is imbued with magical energies not tied to a specific tradition of magic. A magical item radiates a magic aura infused with its dominant school of magic.  
  
 Some items or effects are closely tied to a particular tradition of magic. In these cases, the item has the arcane, divine, occult, or primal trait instead of the magical trait. Any of these traits indicate that the item is magical.

ability.name: Breath Weapon

traits.name: Divine
traits.text: This magic comes from the divine tradition, drawing power from deities or similar sources. Anything with this trait is magical.

traits.name: Evocation
traits.text: Effects and magic items with this trait are associated with the evocation school of magic, typically involving energy and elemental forces.

traits.name: Fire
traits.text: Effects with the fire trait deal fire damage or either conjure or manipulate fire. Those that manipulate fire have no effect in an area without fire. Creatures with this trait consist primarily of fire or have a magical connection to that element. Planes with this trait are composed of flames that continually burn with no fuel source. Fire planes are extremely hostile to non-fire creatures.

ability.text: Cloudsplitter breathes fire in a 30-foot cone, dealing 18d6 fire damage (DC 40 basic Reflex save). Cloudsplitter can't use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.

ability.name: Rearing Thrust
ability.text: The kirin rushes forward, rears up on their hind legs, and descends upon their target with their horn. The kirin Strides and makes a horn Strike. If this Strike hits, it deals an 2d8 additional  damage, and the target is knocked prone.

ability.name: Trample
ability.text: Medium or smaller, phantom hoof, DC 40
